TF2 мой личный первый опыт со стимом .
Я помню как  качал ее 3 дня . Это было лето 2010-11 года ( я уже сам не помню) . Я засел в неё на недели , играл не перестовая из-за дня в день , с перерывами на кушанье и сон .
Имено в этой игре я набрал свой первый 1к часов.
Для меня это очень важная игра ,и печально видеть то что с ней сейчас происходит.
TF2 Это умерающий проэкт , рано или поздно он умрет .
TF2 это старый друг с которым надо попрощаться .
И я говорю прощай .
Jogo muito bom e divertido, possui sistema de transações porém é possivel jogar sem gastar nada, o que vai prevalecer é a habilidade. Dá para jogar por horas e se divertir em cada partida!!

12/10 would die of laughter to kids raging again.

but in all seriousness, this game is absolutely amazing. some say it's legendary. and I agree completely. you just have so much excitement when playing the game, whether you're on a god-like killstreak, or you just got your first unusual. great game.

Game still probably sucks for new players and new matchmaking reset will cause some probems for a while but at least it seems like effort is still being made to try to improve the game. $4.14 out of $5.

Team Fortress 2 is a free-to-play First Person Shooter made the By VALVe. It revolves around the 9 diverse classes that you play as in the 100+ maps and 14 and counting game modes. It offers an amazing amount of fun for something that is free. Tf2 isn't Pay 2 Win in any fashion besides looking like a badass, Who paid 50$ for that cool looking hat on the market, and giving you some more slots. Just cough up 10 cents and your good to go. Overall, it is fun, diverse and has more content added by the.......oh...hmmmmmmm...... a couple months....maybe? But thats besides the point, it's fun, it's funny, and it's funnier than Skyrim. What more can you ask for?

This game is very fun and can make you laugh (alot) but the only bad thing for new players is the learning curve. if i have to say one thing to new players is know what your team needs and practice (lots of practice). make shour you know what you are doing and try to do it no mater how much you fail. just keep trying and you will sucssed eventually.

The casual servers are swarming with aimbot players.
It is a nice casual game if you have a few friends to play with, but casual servers are unbalanced in most of the cases. Random crits are fair and balanced and respawn times should be skippable or otherwise compensated because it can be really boring.

Öncelikle Selamun Aleyküm Arkadaşlar Bugünkü İncelememiz Team Fortress 2

- Grafik : Oyun Grafik Bakımından Normal Bakımda Ama Geliştirlebilir

- Karakterler : Karakterlere Lafım Yoktur Favori Karakter Olarak Spy kullanırım Ama Her Karakterin Antisi var Bu iyi birşey.

- Oyun içi : Mikrofon Basıp, Chata Yazabiliyorsunuz Muhteşem Birşey Basit Eğlenceden düşürdüğünüz eşyalar bildirim kısmına geliyor ordan envanterinize Atabiliyorsunuz Oyun modları Olarak;Bayrak Kapmaca,Tepenin Hakimi,Yük Vagonu,Botlarla Oynama ve Daha çok şey var aklımda klanlar sadece Bu Oyun biraz CS:GO Ya benzemiş olsada gayet iyi Bu arada Rekabetçiye girmek için Para istiyor bilet Almayı unutmayın Bence Alın Derim :)
